bibl.title: P. Mich. 6925: A New Magical Love Charm.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Michigan. Summary in DA 46 (1986) p. 3343-A. - Editio princeps of P. Mich. Inv. 6925, the most extensive love charm inscribed on an extant lead tablet. The text is very similar to the "philtrokatadesmos" of P.G.M. IV, 335 ff.
Martinez David Grey, P. Mich. 6925: A New Magical Love Charm.
